channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1694; 09:07PM; SB 5 Fwy x 110 Fwy; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xzM4a0" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xzM4a0</a>; #ElysianPark; Firefighters made an aggressive attack on the burning brush, by ground and air, and limited the spread to less than one acre in the steep terrain. Thankfully, there were no injuries and no structures damaged. It took 36 firefighters 48 minutes to extinguish the flames. The cause remains undetermined.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 BP44 E12 E201 E202 E212 E290 E3 E4 E44 E47 EM1 H1 H3 H4 H6 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA6 RA1 T1 T12 T2 T90; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hazardous Materials; INC#1628; 07:41PM; 215 VA; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4614g95" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4614g95</a>; #Westwood; Firefighters responded to reports of smoke coming from the sidewalk and from a vault. Crews set up a perimeter, asked building nearby building occupants to close doors/windows and shelter in place, and deployed monitoring equipment. Hazardous Materials Specialists determined that the smoke/white vapor cloud coming from underground was a large amount of steam from an underground construction operation and that there was no hazard present and determined the site is safe. No reported injuries.; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC9 E19 E237 E295 E37 E59 E95 EM9 JT2 RA19 RA37 RA59 RA95 SQ95 T37 T95; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1694; 08:19PM; 2220 E Humboldt St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4eSVE8E" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4eSVE8E</a>; LincolnHeights; PRELIM: Approximately three-quarters of an acre burning uphill in steep terrain with light wind.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 BP44 E12 E201 E202 E212 E290 E3 E4 E44 E47 EM1 H1 H3 H4 H6 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA6 RA1 T1 T12 T2 T90; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1509; 06:18PM; 630 E Century Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bzUXOq" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bzUXOq</a>; #GreenMeadows; Firefighters responded to a 3-vehicle traffic collision resulting in a total of 10 injured patients (6 adults and 4 juveniles). Firefighters extricated one of the drivers, who was trapped. All others escaped the vehicles on their own. The adult female driver who was trapped was transported in serious condition. Five other adults were transported in fair condition. Three juveniles were transported in moderate condition. Sadly, the remaining juvenile was a 12-year-old female who died at the scene of the crash (total of 9 transported & 1 deceased). LAPD Inc #4251. Nothing further.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E21 E221 E264 E65 EM13 HR3 RA21 RA57 RA65 T21 T64; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Train vs Pedestrian; INC#1360; 05:06PM; 6777 W Hollywood Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3vJSDRd" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3vJSDRd</a>; #Hollywood; Firefighters and paramedics are on scene at the Hollywood/Highland Metro Station for an incident involving a train and a pedestrian. Rescuers are working to remove the patient from under a train, who sustained serious lower extremity injuries. Commuters can expect delays on the B Line (formerly Red Line), as the track between Universal City and Hollywood/Vine are currently shut down. Paramedics will transport the patient to an area hospital after they are removed from their location beneath the train.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC13 BC5 E227 E235 E261 E27 E52 E76 E82 EM5 HR3 RA41 SQ21 T27 T35 T61 UR27; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Knockdown; INC#0175; 01:21AM; 175 E 49th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/45Qtmr2" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/45Qtmr2</a>; #SouthPark; Firefighters responded to a one-story single-family home with fire showing. Crews coordinated interior fire attack efforts with rooftop ventilation to extinguish the flames in 45 minutes (2:06am). The cause of the fire was attributed to a medical equipment malfunction. No reported injuries. The structure is unsafe to reoccupy and Building and Safety will be responding with a Red Tag. The family was issued a SAVE card on scene to help them during this time. Thankfully, no one was injured.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E14 E21 E221 E233 E33 E46 EM13 RA15 RA33 RA846 SQ21 T21 T33; CH7; 12 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#2101; 12:15AM; 8370 N Paso Robles Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VQPNIb" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VQPNIb</a>; #Northridge; Firefighters arrived to find large flames burning up into the night sky from a row of Cypress trees, in close proximity to several residential structures. Crews quickly deployed fire hose streams to knock back the flames. Thankfully, the fire was extinguished before any structures became involved. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC17 E100 E103 E104 E288 E289 E290 E75 E87 RA100 RA87 RA903 T88 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#2101; 11:57PM; 8370 N Paso Robles Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VQPNIb" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VQPNIb</a>; #Northridge; PRELIM: Row of large Cypress trees on fire, threatening nearby residential structures. ; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC17 E100 E103 E104 E288 E289 E290 E75 E87 RA100 RA87 RA903 T88 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1995; 11:13PM; 18230 W Lull St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/45RkNMF" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/45RkNMF</a>; Reseda; Firefighters arrived to find heavy fire from a detached garage behind a one-story home. Crews quickly extinguished the flames and prevented spread to the home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC15 BC17 E103 E273 E287 E290 E293 E296 E70 E83 E90 E93 RA70 RA73 RA90 T73 T87 T90 T93 T96; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Tree Fire; INC#1460; 08:43PM; 8309 N Topeka Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RTxW22" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RTxW22</a>; #Northridge; *Corrected Address* Firefighters stopped at the corner, connected to the hydrant, and drove to the end of the cul-de-sac where a row of Cypress trees was engulfed with flames and dropping embers on several nearby roofs of homes. Firefighters quickly deployed hose streams to extinguish the flames and prevent the nearby homes from becoming involved. Thankfully, no one was injured and no structures were damaged. Witnesses initially reported illegal fireworks in the area, but the official cause is still under investigation.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E273 E290 RA903 T73 T90; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange
